ygData.subject: Thoughts on Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, Back to the Diamond dust thing, no-one has figured out this compactor,  I was curious, Since you can get diamond shards off the dino s in
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, Back to the Diamond dust thing, no-one has
figured out this compactor, <that I know of> I was
curious, Since you can get diamond shards off the
dino's in OOT, why not toss 1 or 2 <etc> into the
compacter and crush them? seems to me it would yield
diamond dust. <course would seem like common sence...
something that goes against Veriant>

Axehandler
